Package com.fssa.projectprovision.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
A service class that provides methods for managing user-related operations in the system. This class interacts with the UserDAO and UserValidator to perform operations on users. It handles user registration, login, retrieval, update, and deletion. Additionally, it provides methods for getting user information by email.
Author:
JayaprakashJaisankar
